_header: A God and yet a man
_description: The mystery of the Incarnation — three cross-rhymed quatrains

BodRawB332.First Lines: A god and yet a manA mayde and yet a mother…
BodRawB332.Last Lines:
…By reasons power to reach itBeleeve and cease to
                    wonder
